1044430.name: Tipping Point Soundtrack
1044430.description:
Includes the original soundtrack for Tipping Point with music by Dan Russell-Pinson in MP3 format. Songs will be placed in your Tipping Point folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Tipping Point\Soundtrack

Track listing:
Message Hidden in a Dream
Binary Paths
Monotony
Meerkats
Waking the Lion
Flashback
Mother’s Day
Letting Go
Waiting
A Better World
On Hold Music
Lonely Searching
Off Again
1044430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
